Welcome to YukkiMusic's Documentation!
======================================

YukkiMusic is an advanced Telegram music bot optimized for high-quality music streaming in Telegram voice chats. Built with Python, Pyrogram, and PyTgCalls, it provides a seamless music experience with support for various sources like YouTube, Spotify, SoundCloud, and more.

Contents:
---------

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Additional Resources

   CHANGELOG

About YukkiMusic
----------------

YukkiMusic is a fork of the original **YukkiMusicBot**, with enhancements and stability improvements. This project is actively maintained to ensure a smooth and feature-rich music experience in Telegram group calls.

For setup, commands, and contributions, check the respective sections.

Need Help?
----------

- **GitHub Issues**: `YukkiMusic Issues <https://github.com/TheTeamVivek/YukkiMusic/issues>`_
- **Telegram Support**: `TheTeamVk <https://t.me/TheTeamVk>`_
- **Star & Fork**: `GitHub Repo <https://github.com/TheTeamVivek/YukkiMusic>`_
